references.reason: This paper introduces the deep evidential regression model, which is fundamental to the proposed EMM model for uncertainty quantification.

references.paper_title: Conditional bernoulli mixtures for multi-label classification
references.reason: This paper introduces the conditional Bernoulli mixture model, which is the basis for the proposed EMM model for handling correlations between labels.

references.paper_title: A gaussian process-bayesian bernoulli mixture model for multi-label active learning
references.reason: This paper proposes a similar model to EMM, using Gaussian Processes and Bernoulli mixtures, serving as a strong baseline for comparison and informing model design choices.

references.paper_title: Evidential deep learning to quantify classification uncertainty
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of evidential deep learning, which is crucial for quantifying uncertainty in the EMM model predictions.

references.paper_title: Active learning for sparse bayesian multilabel classification
references.reason: This paper focuses on active learning in sparse Bayesian multilabel classification, directly addressing the challenges of limited labeling budget and large label space that the proposed EMM model aims to overcome.
